evidence.title: README (segment 3)
README (segment 4)
evidence.excerpt: - Built-in support [Clash Premium](https://github.com/Dreamacro/clash), [Mihomo](https://github.com/MetaCubeX/mihomo) & [Clash Rust](https://github.com/Watfaq/clash-rs). - Profiles management and enhancement (by YAML, JavaScript & Lua). [Doc](https://nyanpasu.elaina.moe/tutorial/proxy-chain) - Provider management support. - Google Material You Design UI and animation support.

evidence.title: README (segment 8)
evidence.excerpt: You should install Rust and Node.js, see [here](https://v2.tauri.app/start/prerequisites/) for more details.

evidence.title: pre-release
evidence.excerpt: ## Clash Nyanpasu Nightly Build Release created at Wed Feb 18 09:41:43 CST 2026. Daily build of **Clash Nyanpasu** on *main* branch. You could download previous Nightly Builds from [here](https://t.me/ClashNyanpasu). ***[See the development log here](https://t.me/s/keikolog/)*** ## What's Changed * chore(deps): update dependency vite-plugin-dts to v4.2.1 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/libnyanpasu/clash-nyanpasu/pull/1530 * chore(deps): update dependency @iconify/json to v2.2.246 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/libnyanpasu/clash-nyanpasu/pull/1532 * chore(deps): update pnpm to v9.10.0 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/libnyanpasu/clash-nyanpasu/pull/1533 * refactor!: migrate to tauri v2 and do a lot of tweaks by @greenhat616 in https://github.com/libnyanpasu/clash-nyanpasu/pull/1510 * fix(deps): pin dependency p-retry to 6.2.0 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/libnyanpasu/clash-nyanpasu/pull/1539 * chore(deps): update dependency shiki to v1.16.3 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/libnyanpasu/clash-nyanpasu/pull/1535 * chore(deps): pin dependencies by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/libnyanpasu/clash-nyanpasu/pull/1542 * chore(deps): update depâ€¦
